Richard Pakleppa (amụrụ n'afọ 1961) bụ onye ọcha Namibia na-ede ihe nkiri, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri.

Pakleppa gụrụ nkà ihe ọmụma na ihe nkiri na Munich, mba Germany ma nweta nzere nsọpụrụ na ọmụmụ Afrịka na Mahadum Cape Town. Kemgbe afọ 1990, ọ na-eduzi ma na-emepụta ihe nkiri na akụkọ ifo na Southern Africa
Ọ bi na South Africa ugbu a.
